/usr/bin/c++    -DCPP11_INITIALIZER_LIST -std=c++0x -DCPP11_AUTO -std=c++0x -std=c++0x    CMakeFiles/ctopo-1.dir/ctopo-1.cpp.o  -o ctopo-1 -rdynamic -L/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/buildOgre ../../src/libDGtalIO.so ../../src/libDGtal.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lboost_program_options-mt -Wl,-Bdynamic -Wl,-rpath,/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/buildOgre:/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/buildOgre/src
